dashboardErrors.failedToAddImageToPoint: Failed to add image to point.

warnings.imageAlreadyLinkedTitle: This image has already linked to this point
warnings.imageAlreadyLinkedExplanation: You can not double-connect the image to the same point, choose another one or click on the map to create a new point.

instructions.header: You can click on the point to edit and see the linked images either select an image to connect to a point
instructions.point1: You can select on an image on the right and add or reconnect to a point, either create a new point for it.
instructions.point2: You can select a point by clicking then you can see its direction and will see the connected images on the right.
instructions.point3: You can delete the selected point that does not have images linked.

dashboard.pointSelectionState: You have selected a point on the map that has {{count}} linked image(s).
dashboard.pointSelectionInstruction: Now you see the linked images highlighted on the right and can set the direction or remove it if no images are attached.

deletePointConfirmation.title: Are you sure you want to delete this point?

deleteImageConfirmation.title: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
